> <OLD>
>
> Nightshift nods and checks all of his recon equipment, including the micro
> probes that deploy from his paw pads.
>
> " Got it. If I stay in beast mode I'll be able ta get in without too much
> notice.  Which is why I like the feline form.   Cat swagger, that's what
> it's all about, friends, cat swagger."

 <NEW>

After a moment there is another bump and lurch as POLAR CLAW's ship's
disengages from the one WINDLORD is piloting. It passed around the
ship one time, dipped a wing in salute and then continued on its way
back towards the ARK.

Checking his gear NIGHTSHIFT notes that his short ranged probes are in
full working order and he had a few, enough to check over small things
or areas relatively quickly.

(OOC: Small meaning locks and machines smaller than a breadbox)

As for the rest of his recon equipment and devices, everything was
working well. He had the standard fare for a recon officer.

On the console in front of WINDLORD the sensors were displaying that
the protohumans had went back into their village and were going about
the everday things of life. Some were milling around in different
structures, others were sitting outside running sharp stones over the
inside of animal skins or perhaps sharpening sticks. Some appeared to
be preparing food or cleaning. No one appeared to be doing anything
out of the ordinary.

(TAG)

- Preston
